apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving couple, a woman and a man, both rendered with a beautiful medium-dark skin tone. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues their figures with a soft, rounded quality, while realistic lighting accentuates their embrace and the vibrant red heart floating between them. The overall visual tone is one of deep affection and strong partnership, perfect for expressing romantic love or a cherished relationship in your digital communications on Apple devices.
